long_description: The K2 Hurrithane snowboard bindings offers park and jib riders the flex and comfort you can only get from urethane highbacks. Padded Tweakback asymmetric highbacks offer smooth side-to-side flex and enhanced heel-side response; tool-free forward lean adjustment. Pro Fusion PC chassis offer a performance flex for advanced riders; they feature tool-free power ramps and multi-position ankle and toe strap mounts. Baseplates feature canted, seamless EVA footbeds with polycarbonate support frames that reduce snow buildup; inward canting improves control and reduces fatigue. Caddi ankle straps feature a contoured 3D shape for free-flexing mobility and durable EVA padding for a cushioned fit; tool-free centering adjustment. Hurrithane bindings feature cored toe straps that save weight and provide a super-snug fit over the toes of your boots; straps offer easy, tool-free adjustment. New MEGA RADchet ratchets feature large aluminum levers for easy operation. These bindings are compatible with Burton The Channel snowboards, disc conversion kit is sold separately.
